Reviews.Title: “Above Average No-Frills Airport Hotel w/Kitchenette”
Reviews.Author: FitDude
Reviews.Content: This was my second stay at this chain during this trip, and this location was superior to the Extended Stay Deluxe in Ft. Lauderdale made the subject of my prior review. This location appeared to be a fairly new hotel 7 miles from Miami airport. My queen bed room included a 2 burner countertop, sink, full size fridge and a small microwave. The Fort Lauderdale location was a “Deluxe” which from what I could tell the only difference was a better equipped kitchen since the room size appeared the same. This location also had free parking, and this chain offers basic housekeeping for $3/day for stays less than a week and Wi-Fi at $4.99. Surprisingly, for such a new hotel, the room had a very small 19 inch CRT tube TV instead of a flat screen which was disappointing. The bed was comfortable, although the pillows were not and the room was quiet. The shower was hot and powerful. Wal-Mart is located less than a mile down the road, as are numerous places to eat, many within walking distance. The staff was very helpful, and for a basic airport stay in Miami, this hotel is recommended and was a good value at only $50/night.

Reviews.Title: “Excelent Hotel great value”
Reviews.Author: eahaas
Reviews.Content: Loved it! Excelent hotel for the value, would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Poor cleaning.”
Reviews.Author: jgabiatti
Reviews.Content: I arrived about 0:30am, and I got scared when I saw that the receptionist was in a protected cabin. In the next day we saw the cops pursuing someone in the parking lot of the walmart near the hotel. I became concerned with the security of that area, but it was just a bad impression, because nothing happened with me and my wife there. The receptionist said that the room is cleaned once time per week.

Reviews.Title: “Very Confortable”
Reviews.Author: patty_montandon
Reviews.Content: This hotel is perfect for business trip, specially if you have low budget. It very clean, spacious rooms, the kitchen have all you need and the area is nice and secure. Many stores and restaurant arround. The pool area is nice. I recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Average ES hotel; fast WiFi; be sure your GPS is working”
Reviews.Author: BikerEd
Reviews.Content: It's okay especially if being by the airport is important. While near the airport, it's not under a flight path and is surprisingly quiet for a busy area. No frills -- and despite being an "extended stay" hotel with cooking facilities, every night I stayed they pushed pizza flyers under the door, perhaps expecting folks won't really cook?

Reviews.Title: “Decent stay. Nothing special.”
Reviews.Author: vseT
Reviews.Content: Walking distances to fast food restaurants and the usual chain (red lobster etc). No grocery stores nearby though you can buy drinking water from gas stations. I didn't order room delivery food. When you check in, you will probably see a lot of restaurant flyers under the door. However, a quick google search didn't reveal the origins of these 'restaurants'. Wireless is a one-time fee of $5.

Reviews.Title: “Good, but...”
Reviews.Author: equipe
Reviews.Content: Nice hotel,very clean rooms with a convenient mini-kitchen with utensils, coffee maker, plates, refrigerator, wireless internet, could not ask for more just a better sleep, since some gentlemen decide to gather in the outside lobby area after 10:00 PM and chat untill almost 3 in the morningI did complaint to the concierge twicw, but I guess he doesnt want to be very rude to those gentlemen, so they stay outside right under my window with loud laughs etc. Important tip: Ask for a room where your window DOES NOT face the main entrance, because that is where they gather after 10 pm and goes till 3 in the morning, you will not sleep, trust me!!

Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay buy could be better”
Reviews.Author: skljajic
Reviews.Content: Not much to say about this hotel, it is good, rooms were fine but it lacked the ambiance. Good place for a short stay. Good choice of restaurants in the neighborhood.

Reviews.Title: “Everything was great!”
Reviews.Author: Russian28
Reviews.Content: I would definitely stay at this hotel again in the future. I gave 4 stars for cleanliness because I am very picky about it. It wasn't spotless but it was very clean, let's put it this way. Service was great! We took a shuttle almost everyday to the airport, and from their we just took the city bus #150 to the beach. It was very convenient, especially if you are a saver. The neighborhood is pretty safe. We had to walk late at night a few times and never saw anything unusual. There are a few restaurants in the walking distance: Red Lobster, Chili's, and some others. There's a Walmart also, but it is quite far. You could walk to it, but to carry your groceries back to the hotel would be more problematic. I had chosen this hotel because of reviews on this website, and I am glad I did. Miami beach hotels are quite expensive, and I have read horror stories with the bugs and roaches about them. I was very satisfied with this hotel, and especially for the price! There is no diner or anything like that at this hotel but I heard the Extended stay delux, which is pretty close, has breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Best value”
Reviews.Author: RicardoJF
Reviews.Content: I have nothing to complain about this hotel. The front desk was efficient and kind during checkin and checkout. The rooms are not small. Good and comfy beds. Clean and tidy. Very good value for a business trip. Not a good location for tourism, but if you rent a car, you can go everywhere, specially the travellers looking for malls. I had a good bed, good TV, good shower and stayed out of the hotel all day.

Reviews.Title: “exceeded expectation for the money paid”
Reviews.Author: mister72
Reviews.Content: It was a good experience---this is no frill hotel---had a little problem in getting the shuttle to pick me up from the airport but once arrived it was fine----very close to the airport, in a very pretty neighbourhood,lots of restaurants in the walking distance---shopping malls close by---very clean rooms, kitchen and well kept property----and all of that for as low as USD 50.00. The staff were very good and helpful. Special mention to Michelle at the reception---very helpful and friendly---nothing was too much bother for her---and the shuttle bus driver was very nice too, took me to the airport before the shuttle scheduled time. All in all --a very good property for the money you pay and I will use this hotel again for my future visits to Miami without any second thoughts.

Reviews.Title: “Exceeded Expectations”
Reviews.Author: kimmieval
Reviews.Content: I chose this hotel based on other Trip Advisor reviewers' recommendations. I have stayed in much more expensive properties, but this hotel room exceed my expectations based on a price of $69.99 plus tax. The toom was clean, to the point that I walked barefeet across the carpet. There is a kitchenette that is very well kept, with a full sized fridge, microwave, toaster coffee maker, stove top and utensils. There was even an ice tray in the freezer. The service was great from check-in and I was ill after my flight and was allowed with no additional hassle to check in early. I had to call the front office more than once, for advice of places to eat and for special items and even with a change of front office staff, I found the service to be excellent. The hotel has a shuttle that picks you up from the airport and the drive to the hotel from MIA is about 10-15 minutes. The hotel is in an office park, so a car is advisable if you want food. There is Chilli's within about 5 blocks if you choose to walk. Otherwise, they are flyers as well as great recommendations from the front desk. Quite a few restaurants in the locale delivers for as little as $2.50. Next time in Miami, better yet, if you have a car, then this hotel comes highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Doral's Extended Stay was a very pleasant experience”
Reviews.Author: spjet
Reviews.Content: Ample room, clean, convenient, and with everything I needed, including mini-kitchen.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful time in extended stay”
Reviews.Author: ronaldillo
Reviews.Content: Hotel was very clean and a friendly staff, good location, I walk to walmart also I took a free bus in front of the hotel to International mall and dolphin mall. Nice restaurants around. I recommended it 100 %.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value & Nice Accomodations”
Reviews.Author: NASCARFLASH24
Reviews.Content: After a long day of travel, checkig in was speedy, and I was in my room within a few minutes. Very clean rooms (& bathrooms!), and a well equipped kitchen. It's close if you want to walk to shoppping & eating establishments. The A/C was great, and I slept like a baby.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for my Needs”
Reviews.Author: SKYGODDESS62
Reviews.Content: I am a flight attnedant who commutes to work. Sometimes I have to spend the night in Miami before or after a trip. I had heard from others about Extended Stay and went to Priceline. I was very happy with this stay. The bed was very comfortable, the bathroom spotless, the kitchen immaculate. I was only there overnight, but would stay again. They even had a DVD player. I was tired when I got in and just collapsed on the couch. I travel for a living and I don't sit on hotel couches, but this was clean and comfy. I will definatly be back!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great home away from home”
Reviews.Author: Niko60613
Reviews.Content: This place had small refrigerator, stove, microwave, and coffee maker. It was clean, convenient, and a great price, too. The cleaning/bed making is extra and must be requested. I almost complained but notice the sign to pick up fresh towels at the front desk, which are extremely friendly and accommodating. Again, the price was the best in the area, especially for what you're getting.

Reviews.Title: “2nd time at this Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Illy1108
Reviews.Content: Booked this room through Priceline for $40. This is our second stay at this hotel, there is another review I did from our August stay. We were alloweed to check in early and our request for a queen room was filled. The room was clean and roomy. My only complaint would be that the bedspread needed to be replaced as it was a bit faded and had a cigarette burn hole on it. We experienced a little bit of noise at night from our upstairs neighbors but not until too late. There are people that have been living at this hotel for over 7 years. We personally saw someone using the luggage cart for groceries. We also smelled cats at one end of the hotel on the first floor. The staff was very friendly and helpful. For the price, the hotel was a good value. It was a place for sleep and it is so centrally located, I always stay in the Doral area for that reason.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Experience”
Reviews.Author: Manuela3
Reviews.Content: I would never stay here again, nor would I recommend anyone else to. Our problems started with the hotel shuttle from the airport. After waiting for a half an hour after we called, a van from the hotel finally came to pick us up at about 8:00 in the evening, but our driver, who could not understand much English, proceeded to get lost or confused or both on the way back to the hotel, leading to a bizarre and scary experience for my husband and me. After we had left the airport, our driver said he had to go back to find someone. So he started to go back, but somehow got lost. I asked him if he could please take us to the hotel and then go back to look for the person, but he kept talking, mumbling and driving up and down these dark streets calling and talking to someone on his cell phone. This went on for half an hour and he kept saying he could not understand us and we could not understand him. So we were driving around Miami until we finally ended up back at the airport! I then demanded that he stop and let us out and my husband was actually opening the door before we stopped so that we could get out and get a taxi to the hotel. He could not speak enough English to communicate with us and he gave my husband his cell phone to talk to someone at the hotel, but we had had enough of him and I was too scared to be driving with him at this point, so we took a $25 cab to the hotel. The cab driver was very nice and very concerned that we were at the right place, which was comforting after our scary ride. The girl at the desk refunded our cab and said she could not understand how this could happen, and assured us that he would not be driving the morning shuttle back to the airport the next day. However, she never apologized. The room was ok...no remote for the tv...nothing special, kind of dingy. We ate at Shorty's, next door which was good. The next morning, we couldn't wait to leave and the shuttle showed up at 8:40 when it was promised at 8:00. Again, the guy at the front desk, never apologized. This place is creepy and weird.

Reviews.Title: “Thieves-R-Us”
Reviews.Author: Bolin311
Reviews.Content: I went outside during my stay to get a swim suit out of my vehicle. When I approached my truck I notice I was walking on glass to soon find out I was a victom of vandalism and theft. Total of 4 vehicles were broken into the night of my stay! The police have been telling the hotel staff to add more lights to the parking lot and they have done nothing! Now this leaves me with a broken window, missing radar detector, golf clubs, bathing suit and shoes. On top of everything I missed my flight. When I finally got a hold of the Hotel Manager she was rude and offering no assistance or discount. "Bienvenido a Miami!"

HotelInfo.Name: Extended StayAmerica Miami - Airport - Doral
HotelInfo.Address: 8655 NW 21st Terrace, Miami, FL 33122
